title: The Hunger Games
description: MAY THE ODDS BE EVER IN YOUR FAVOURWinning will make you famous.Losing means certain death.In a dark vision of the near future, twelve boys and twelve girls are forced to appear in a live TV show called the Hunger Games. There is only one rule: kill or be killed.When sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdeen steps forward to take her sister's place in the games, she sees it as a death sentence. But Katniss has been close to death before. For her, survival is second nature.Cover image by Tim O'Brien
author: Suzanne Collins
